Class DatabaseController

java.lang.Object
controller.DatabaseController
public class DatabaseController extends Object
Controller responsible for managing database operations across different DAOs (UserDAO, ClientDAO, GameDAO, GameSessionDAO). Acts as a bridge between the MainController and the DatabaseManager, delegating queries, inserts, updates and deletions through an established SQL connection.
Since:
3.3
Author:
Davitroon

  • Constructor Details

    • DatabaseController

      public DatabaseController(MainController mainController, DatabaseManager dbManager)
      Creates a new DataBaseController and initializes the database connection.
      Parameters:
      mainController - reference to the main application controller
      dbManager - database manager providing DAO access and connections

  • Method Details

    • addUser

      public User addUser(User user, boolean rememberSession) throws SQLIntegrityConstraintViolationException, MailException
      Adds a new user to the database.
      Parameters:
      user - the user object containing registration data
      rememberSession - true if the user session should be remembered
      Returns:
      the registered user object
      Throws:
      SQLIntegrityConstraintViolationException - if the username or email already exists
      MailException - if there is an issue sending confirmation mail
      Since:
      3.3

    • checkRememberLogin

      public ResultSet checkRememberLogin()
      Checks if any user has a remembered login session.
      Returns:
      a ResultSet with remembered login data
      Since:
      3.3

    • queryUser

      public ResultSet queryUser(User user)
      Queries user information from the database.
      Parameters:
      user - user object containing the query parameters
      Returns:
      a ResultSet with the queried user data
      Since:
      3.3

    • enableRememberLogin

      public void enableRememberLogin(String name)
      Enables the "remember login" flag for the given user.
      Parameters:
      name - the username whose session will be remembered
      Since:
      3.3

    • disableRememberLogin

      public void disableRememberLogin()
      Disables the "remember login" flag for all users.
      Since:
      3.3

    • queryClients

      public ResultSet queryClients(boolean onlyActive)

      game - the game that was played
      betResult - the result of the bet (positive or negative)

    • addDefaultUser

      public void addDefaultUser()
      Adds default clients and games when creating a new user. Includes one default client and the default games (Blackjack and Slotmachine).
      Since:
      3.3
